channel.title: New rule
channel.description: Make users have to use the search bar before they can post in the help forums.

item.title: New rule
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Good luck enforcing this one :o

Read full topic

item.title: New rule
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Users should use search before asking for help and often they do. For those who don’t or don’t find adequate help through searching (trust me, smf searching is pretty bad), then they should be able to openly post in the help section and not expect conflict. If people are getting sick of answering the same questions, then they can just stop helping people out. No one is obligated to help users. We have people come and go everyday to help people.

Read full topic

item.title: New rule
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

That would be a bit hard to enforce and it seems to be a rule that a dictator would use or something. In my opinion all we can do is encourage members to use the search bar, if we were to enforce this then users could claim to of used it and then proceed to ask their question.

Read full topic
